title: COVID Healing Protocol: Virus and Vaccine
author: Patty Buckley
description: This is a Light Language Transmission that assists in relevant COVID related concerns, including vaccine remorse and damage to the Light Body and Genes.
sitename: Love Rising Academy - The Workshops and Sound Healings of Sound Shaman, Jamie Lu
cleaned_text: COVID Healing Protocol: Virus and Vaccine This is a Light Language Transmission that assists in relevant COVID related concerns, including vaccine remorse and damage to the Light Body and Genes. and what is included In the span of 24 hours I was given Source codes and frequencies to assist in COVID related experiences that my clients have brought to my attention. The Covid Healing Protocol is here and I hope this helps many Soul's raise their frequency beyond the virus and the vaccine. The vaccine can cause harm to our intelligent Spiritual Anatomy called the Light Body. This protocol will help aid in understanding the higher purpose of COVID and the journey of embodying Sovereignty. As we each do our part to become more Whole and Sovereign we will grow out of the need for the existence of COIVD on our planet. What is inside The COVID Healing Protocol: to re-establish lines of communication within the body that have been blocked by exposure to viruses, bacteria and day-to-day stresses that can break down the immune system. Clear Regret and Remorse post injection Light Body Repair for the COVID Vaccine Rapid Healing During COVID - Do this if you are experiencing invasion! Post COVID Virus Clean Up Protocol and Gene Healing Loss, Grief, Aloneness and Isolation Healing Music for Clearing the vaccine and shedding. Harmonizes relationships. These are just some of the healing frequencies you'll experience in this Sound Transmission Genetic Healing - Repairs the Genetic Expressions of A12, B7, and C7 and removes any pre-dispositions to COVID inherited by the family line. Solfeggio 174 hz - Physical pain relief, reduces stress, and lessens tension in the body. Solfeggio 285 hz - Addresses holes in your aura or energetic field. It influences the energy fields to send messages to restructure damaged organs/tissue. Solfeggio 396 hz - Releases emotional fear and guilt. Solfeggio 741 hz - Cellular detox of toxins and unnatural substances distorting your organic matrix Solfeggio 963 hz - God Source Energy Gateway. Crystal Tones Bowl in A# - Tibetan Quartz Copper - Pulls density out and pulls Light into cells. Copper is anti-viral. 111 hz - the frequency of wholeness.
